==Abilities and Attacks==
*'''Electro Slime Throw:''' Digs an [[Electro Slime]] out of the ground and throws it at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}. Staggering the Grenadier during this attack will knock the Electro Slime out of its hands. An Electro Slime knocked out of the Grenadier's hands will stay on the ground for a period of time before exploding and dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.
**Although the Electro Slime is highlighted as an {{Electro}} entity under [[Elemental Sight]], it will not react with another element, neither will it cause an {{Electro}} [[Elemental Absorption]] to occur.
